original_title: Swedish Trading Company hosts “REIGNITE” Customer Day fostering collaborative partnerships
original_body_lines: Swedish Trading Company, a historic company witnessing a resurgence under a new generation of leadership hosted its “REIGNITE” Customer Day, on Friday, 24th November 2023, at Trace Expert City, Colombo 10. The event was held under the theme of “powering the industry, sustaining the planet” and unfolded from 2:00pm onwards, marking a significant occasion for the company.

REIGNITE symbolized a resurgence of Swedish Trading Company, together with its sister companies, General Sales Company and Swedish Trading Audio Visual, all founded by legendary businessman and visionary, Chandra Senanayake over his 50+ year career, beginning in 1968. Now under the leadership of the third generation of the family, the Group is undergoing a significant strategic shift that has propelled the company into capturing market share after a period of challenge and transformation.

Accordingly, the event’s objectives were multifaceted and centred around empowering customers and partners, by fostering strong and mutually beneficial partnerships. Through equipping valued customers with the skills and knowledge necessary to maximize the benefits of the showcased products and services, Swedish Trading Company, General Sales Company and Swedish Trading Audio Visual aimed to build a foundation for sustained success through collaborative partnerships.

Reflecting on the success of the event, Lasith Senanayake, Group CEO said, “The REIGNITE Customer Day was a reflection of our renewed commitment to excellence. We have navigated challenges, made strategic changes, and now, we are back stronger than ever. This event marks the beginning of a new era for Swedish Trading Company and the wider group, where innovation and customer satisfaction take centre stage. We look forward to growing together with our customers and partners, through collaboration and collective endeavours in the future.”

The focal point of REIGNITE was the launch of the GA VSD– Atlas Copco’s cutting-edge air compressor. This third-generation compressor, a testament to technological advancement, offers up to 60% energy savings compared to fixed-speed compressors. Alongside this, the showcase of flagship products from Swedish Trading Company and General Sales Company, including Atlas Copco, SKF, and Xylem, highlighted the Group’s commitment to providing innovative solutions across various industries, from garments, tea, rubber and pharmaceuticals to water, electricity, and railways.
